data.author: Rob of the Sky People

changelog.release_notes:
This is my first working modification of MyNameIsKir's Binary Watch watchface for the Pebble Smart Watch (https://github.com/MyNameIsKir/Pebble-Binary-Watch-C). Most of the code is hers; I just fumbled around with some modifications--namely, I changed it from an 8-bit-per-line display to a 6-bit used a different, larger font added the old-school green-on-black "homebrew" color scheme and removed the date window.

Many thanks to MyNameIsKir for her help and her work.

data.description: 6-bit binary watchface in homebrew colors derived from MyNameIsKir's Binary Watch face.

latest_release.release_notes:
This is my first working modification of MyNameIsKir's Binary Watch watchface for the Pebble Smart Watch (https://github.com/MyNameIsKir/Pebble-Binary-Watch-C). Most of the code is hers; I just fumbled around with some modifications--namely, I changed it from an 8-bit-per-line display to a 6-bit used a different, larger font added the old-school green-on-black "homebrew" color scheme and removed the date window.

Many thanks to MyNameIsKir for her help and her work.

data.title: 6-bit Homebrew Binary Watchface
